content: wool wash for a minimum of 15 minutes to fully wet block it once soaked gently press out the excess water sandwich the damp sweater between clean towels and step carefully 7 all images illustrations and text © bare knit the knitting club sweater - schematic - upper arm circumference 32 34 39 43 45 cm 12 5 13 25 15 25 17 17 75 yoke depth 20 22 24 25 26 5 cm 8 8 75 9 5 10 10 5 underarm to hem body length 37 cm / 14 5 front 39 cm / 15 25 back sleeve length from underarm 45 cm / 17 75 bust circumference cuff circumference 98 103 109 116 123 cm 19 5 21 24 25 26 cm 38 5 40 5 43 45 75 48 5 7 75 8 25 9 5 9 75 10 25 ©2025 iryna zelenetska all rights reserved in purchasing this pattern you agree to print and use this pattern and the items made from it only for your personal non-commercial use you may not distribute or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern or parts of this pattern designer can be contacted at bareknitstudio@gmail com pattern version 2 1 / january 2026 8 all images illustrations and text © bare knit let s connect video tutorials and knitting podcast on youtube https //www youtube com/@bareknitstudio my designs on ravelry - https //www ravelry com/designers/bare-knit @bareknit on instagram @bareknit on tiktok if you share photos of your bare knit projects make sure to tag me @bareknit and use hashtags #bareknit and #bareknitknittingclubsweater contact and support for questions pattern support and other information please email bareknitstudio@gmail com you might also like candy cane headband https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/candy-cane- headband icelandic mini sweater https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/icelandic- mini-sweater 9 all images illustrations and text © bare knit
